messages.content: Good Enough Avenue. Someone is running around the neighborhood shooting a gun.
Okay. Are they on foot or in a car?
I don't know. I'm back in my house. I can't tell. I think they're running on foot.
But they're on the floor, you guys.
Do you know if it's a male or a female? Do you have any description?
I don't know. My husband went outside. I'm in the house with my kids. Let me look out the window.
Okay. Please don't put yourself in any danger. They are en route. Okay. What's your name?
